Visualization tutorial¶

[26]:

import os
import path
import nglview
import sys
import importlib
import pandas as pd

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
#%matplotlib notebook

base_path=os.path.abspath('C:/Users/hcarv/Desktop/figures')
data_path=os.path.abspath('C:/Users/hcarv/Documents/work/notebook_results')
sys.path.append(base_path)
sys.path.append(data_path)

import visual
importlib.reload(visual)
results=base_path

Density descriptors¶

[28]:

importlib.reload(visual)
stride=1


figures={
    '50mM':[3, 9, 17],
    '150mM':[3, 11, 19],
    '300mM':[3, 11, 19],
    '600mM':[3, 11, 27],
    '1M':[3, 11, 27],
    '2.5M':[7, 15, 31],
    '5.5M':[7, 15, 31]}

states=[('SB', 3),
        ('PB',9),
        ('AB', 17),
        ('PSB', 11),
        ('ASB', 19),
        ('APSB', 27),
        ('ESB', 7),
        ('PESB', 15),
        ('APESB', 31)]

stride=1
stat_dist=pd.read_csv(f'{data_path}\kNAC_hist2-calb-MeOH_5-4.5-24.0.csv', index_col=0)
#stat_dist

iso_levels=visual.plot_densityStats(figures, results, stride, states, stat_dist=stat_dist)

[29]:

{'50mM': [0.096884954759119, 1.159999246267684, 9.073983175039288],
 '150mM': [0.252295807588673, 0.283116113613005, 0.337137881396879],
 '300mM': [0.469390392218617, 0.485502206280883, 0.576175892099996],
 '600mM': [0.963880276489474, 0.872837052135633, 0.89823598324857],
 '1M': [2.138767286234144, 1.462546666107841, 1.349536834456387],
 '2.5M': [4.650185369489329, 3.201075908409909, 3.155253978154407],
 '5.5M': [41.51347302580475, 6.824795356888476, 6.661842107335743]}

[30]:

double=[('50mM', [True, False, False]),
        ('150mM',[True, True, True]),
        ('300mM', [True, True, True]),
        ('600mM', [True, True, True]),
        ('1M', [True, True, True]),
        ('2.5M', [True, True, True]),
        ('5.5M', [True, True, True])]

iso_levels_mod={}

for x in double:
    mods=[]
    for idx, y in enumerate(x[1]):
        original=iso_levels[x[0]][idx]
        new=original*2
        if y == True:
            mods.append(new)
        else:
            mods.append(original)

        iso_levels_mod[x[0]]=mods
iso_levels_mod

Graphical Interface¶

[35]:

importlib.reload(visual)
visualizations=visual.get_visualizations(figures, iso_levels_mod, states, stride, results)

[36]:

#figures={
#    '50mM':[3, 9, 17],
#    '150mM':[3, 11, 19],

#    '600mM':[3, 11, 27],
#    '1M':[3, 11, 27],
#    '2.5M':[7, 15, 31],
#    '5.5M':[7, 15, 31]}
importlib.reload(visual)
view, file=visual.graphical(visualizations)
view

importlib.reload(visual)
stride_full=5
iso_levels_full=visual.plot_densityStats_full(figures, results, stride_full, stat_dist=stat_dist)

[ ]:

[ ]:
